description.original: This plugin enables you to increase/decrease the size of an image by scrolling
description.translation: 此插件允许您通过鼠标滚轮来增大/减小图片尺寸。

dict..setDesc('Key that needs to be pressed d: .setDesc('需要同时按下，才能使鼠标滚轮缩放功能启用的键')
dict..setDesc('Step value by which the size o: .setDesc('每次滚动一小格滚轮，图片尺寸增加/减少的步进值')
dict..setDesc('Initial image size if no size: .setDesc('如果之前没有定义图片大小，则图片的初始大小')
